desmoj.extensions.applicationDomains.harbour

Class CranesSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • desmoj.core.simulator.NamedObject
      • desmoj.core.simulator.ModelComponent
        • desmoj.core.simulator.Reportable
          • desmoj.core.simulator.QueueBased
            • desmoj.extensions.applicationDomains.harbour.CranesSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Subject<QueueBased,QueueBased.QueueAction>

    public class CranesSystem
extends QueueBased
    A CranesSystem represents the system of the cranes that manages the queues of the cranes and transporter (external/internal), give the statistics about the cranes and both queues.
    See Also:
    QueueBased

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class desmoj.core.simulator.QueueBased

    • Constructor Detail

      • CranesSystem

        public CranesSystem(Model owner,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    int cSortOrder,
                    int cQCapacity,
                    int tSortOrder,
                    int tQCapacity,
                    boolean showInReport,
                    boolean showInTrace)
        Constructor for a CranesSystem. The queueing discipline and the capacity limit of the underlying queues for the cranes and for the transporters can be chosen.
        Parameters:
        owner - Model : The model this CranesSystem is associated to.
        name - java.lang.String : The CranesSystem's name
        csortOrder - int : determines the sort order of the underlying cranes queue implementation. Choose a constant from QueueBased like QueueBased.FIFO or QueueBased.LIFO or ...
        cQCapacity - int : The capacity of the cranes queue, that is how many cranes can be enqueued. Zero (0) means unlimited capacity.
        tsortOrder - int : determines the sort order of the underlying transporter queue implementation. Choose a constant from QueueBased like QueueBased.FIFO or QueueBased.LIFO or ...
        tQCapacity - int : The capacity of the transporter queue, that is how many transporters can be enqueued. Zero (0) means unlimited capacity.
        showInReport - boolean : Flag, if this CranesSystem should produce a report or not.
        showInTrace - boolean : Flag for trace to produce trace messages.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets all statistical counters to their default values. Both, cranes queue and transporter queue are reset. The mininum and maximum length of the queues are set to the current number of queued objects.
        Overrides:
        reset in class QueueBased
